QuestData.Title: Mossing the Mark
QuestData.Description:
Poor girl...
She must have gotten sick after eating something tainted.
Luckily, my grandfather was a druid and taught me how to treat arcane-based illnesses.
I don't have all the components on me, but we can make do with what's around.
First, I will need some drakmoss. It is a rare lichen that only grows on dragon bones.
QuestData.RewardText:
Oh! Thank you so much, $n!
I may be a mage, but sometimes natural solutions are the most effective.
